description_html:
It is said that all good things come in threes and so the Twins family grows this year with the addition of a coquettish two-seater sofa, a loveseat in a very real sense. Because its compactness and small scale it is perfect for reduced spaces or cozy environments.
The loveseat, just like the two original armchairs before, looks casual, but elegant, extremely contemporary and exquisitely finished. Equally concerned for aesthetics and functionality, it thus become a holistic design granting further resistance and comfort thanks to high quality materials.
Its upholstery in OmegaTM Outdoor, a 3D mesh specifically developed by the Danish company Gabriel for Expormim, stretches beautifully upon the aluminum frame creating attractive visual effects. It is again a collection wholly suitable for outdoor, although its gentle lines and soothing colour palette allow for an easy and natural adaptation to interiors.
Its structure is made of high resistance aluminum tube. Different colours are available: white, black, brown and champagne fine textured. 3D Mesh OmegaTM Outdoor comes in black, taupe, paprika and turquoise. A wide range of outdoor fabrics is also available for the seat pad and decorative cushions.
